typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Product ID} as string,
		{Location ID} as string,
		{Sales Person ID} as string,
		{Customer ID} as string,
		{Purchase Date} as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceCPG
SourceCPG derive(SourceProductID = toInteger(substring({Product ID},4,length({Product ID}))),
		Year = toInteger(right({Purchase Date},4))) ~> AddSourceProductNo
AddSourceProductNo keyGenerate(output(Product_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddSuurogateKey
AddSuurogateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OutPutCPG'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> OutputCPGDataSet
